alert.note: Alert for Cass; Mason; Menard; Morgan; Sangamon; Schuyler; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 01 at 3:55AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Illinois and west central Illinois, including the following counties, in central Illinois, Mason, Menard and Sangamon. In west central Illinois, Cass, Morgan, Schuyler and Scott. * WHEN...Until 700 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 355 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1.5 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Springfield, Jacksonville, Beardstown, Rushville, Virginia, Chatham, Alexander, Sherman, Rochester, Riverton, Petersburg, Athens, Williamsville, New Berlin, Ashland, Meredosia, Bluff Springs, Pleasant Plains, Loami and Bluffs. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Mason; Menard; Morgan; Sangamon; Schuyler; Scott
